thread.title: Happy Mom
thread.title_full: Get Rung reviewed by Happy Mom

author: Happy Mom
title: Happy Mom
text: I was shopping in a local home store for these mats, and I saw that they were 4 for $20. I thought I would look online further, and discovered Get Rung. At Get Rung, they had more selection, and a better deal. In the end I only spent $25, and got 6 mats! The shipping only took 3 or 4 business days. Once they arrived I put them together, and our 6 month old son rolls around on them and plays happily.
